infoList.first: Welcome to my page, I am Dr.Andreea Calude.
infoList.second: I am bubbly and approachable and I can make anyone excited about

introdution:
I research various aspects of language,
 especially the language of social media and 
 I speak and write about this.
Capablity:
I currently work as a Senior Lecturer in Linguistics at the University of Waikato, in New Zealand. 
 I am available  to :
CapablityList: consult on forensic linguistics as an expert witness.

highlights.title: Ted Ed educator
